sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Section from "react-bulma-components/lib/components/section"; import Box from 'react-bulma-components/lib/components/box'; import Media from 'react-bulma-components/lib/components/media'; import Image from 'react-bulma-components/lib/components/image'; import Tag from 'react-bulma-components/lib/components/tag'; import Content from 'react-bulma-components/lib/components/content'; import '../App.css'; import { useQuery } from "react-query"; import { getBuild} from "../middlewares/services"; const MascaraBuild = () => { const { isLoading, error, data } = useQuery("build", getBuild); if (isLoading) return "Loading..."; if (error) return "Oops! "; return (
{data[0] ? { data.map( element => {element.bottle ?

Name { element.bottle.name }
Thread { element.bottle.thread }
Depth { element.bottle.depth }

: "" } {element.brush ?

Name { element.brush.brush }
Type { element.brush.type }
Length { element.brush.brushLength }
Shaft diameter { element.brush.shaftDiameter }
Brush diameter { element.brush.brushDiameter }


: "" } {element.rod ?

Name { element.rod.name }
Thread { element.rod.thread }
Length { element.rod.dimensions.length }
Shaft diameter { element.rod.dimensions.brushDiameter }
Rod diameter { element.rod.dimensions.rodDiameter }


: "" } {element.wiper ?

Name { element.wiper.name } Mold { element.wiper.mold } drawing { element.wiper.drawing }


: "" } )} : "" }
) }; export default MascaraBuild;
